overview:
## Discussion

Set this configuration value to cause a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/FetchRequest] to execute a fetch with a new collection of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSSortDescriptor] instances. If you want to use [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/SortDescriptor] instances, set [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/FetchRequest/Configuration/sortDescriptors] instead.

Access this value of a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/FetchRequest/Configuration] structure for a given request by using the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/FetchedResults/nsSortDescriptors] property on the associated [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/FetchedResults] instance, either directly or through a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Binding].

# nsSortDescriptors

**Instance Property**

The request’s sort descriptors, accessed as reference types.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency var nsSortDescriptors: [NSSortDescriptor]
```

## Discussion

Set this configuration value to cause a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/FetchRequest] to execute a fetch with a new collection of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSSortDescriptor] instances. If you want to use [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/SortDescriptor] instances, set [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/FetchRequest/Configuration/sortDescriptors] instead.

Access this value of a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/FetchRequest/Configuration] structure for a given request by using the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/FetchedResults/nsSortDescriptors] property on the associated [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/FetchedResults] instance, either directly or through a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Binding].

## Setting sort descriptors

- **sortDescriptors**: The request’s sort descriptors, accessed as value types.
